c:complexType.name: DotExtensionPoint
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The class of protovis Dot extension points.
See the associated protovis documentation at .

c:property.name: angle
c:property.c:documentation:
The rotation angle, in radian units.
Some shapes, like the are sensitive to rotation.

c:property.name: shape
c:property.c:documentation: The name of the shape that the dot assumes.

c:property.name: radius
c:property.c:documentation: The radius of the dot, in pixel units.

c:property.name: size
c:property.c:documentation:
The size of the dot, in square pixel units.
The size is proportional to the area of the shape and is better suited than the for representing measures.
For the record: size = radius * radius.
